about_the_game:
News:

Game Features

  • A variety of traditional FPS guns : shotgun, pistol, rifle, machine gun ect..
  • Explore a space station labyrinth with drones, story and interactive technology.
  • Original voice acting, music score and sound design.
A single player, first person shooter, adventure game featuring voice acting and sound design. Explore space stations and future city environments, collect items to further your investigation. A somewhat gritty, storydriven, cyberpunk-ish, drone shooting, FPS game.

Story Synopsis :
In a post World War 4 underworld society, where new technologies have been integrated into both human society and human biology, new sets of problems arise for the common citizen. In the space city of Fortuna Minor, new crimes are placed in the X-Dead Department, “X-Dead” referring to dead androids having the ability to be brought back to life with the help of technology, but case files are stacking up and assistance is needed.

A string of hackers, saboteurs and viciously intelligent secret agents have corrupted every facet of society, from cops to politicians. Top influencers seek power, new influencers seek recognition and both will do anything they can to get it. It’s a strange and ambiguous reality for many in the world of advanced technologies and new social movements like “Religious Rights for Robots”. The extremely rich and powerful hacker lord, “Yellow Queen”, strikes swift and undefeated, while the
highly influential "Stiffer" corporation looks the other way.
